author: abcoathup
content:
Can you create a short summary of the call?

I have created a wiki post (that you should be able to edit) for breakout #1
https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/peerdas-breakout-1/20275
This is in the style of **ACD Proposal 2: Breakout Room Templates** https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/allcoredevs-network-upgrade-ethmagicians-process-improvements/20157
